writes:


> That "demon" part confused me until I saw that they no longer consider
> themselves an "experimental" school, but rather a "demonstration" school. I

The "demon" part comes from an internet service provider www.demon.net.

hth

WJ

messages.subject: Re: Summerhill site
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, Thanks for the info on Summerhill.  The site is being changed, though.  The temporary address is: www.s-hill.demon.co.uk That demon part confused me
messages.messageBody:
Joyce,

Thanks for the info on Summerhill. The site is being changed, though. The
temporary address is:

www.s-hill.demon.co.uk

That "demon" part confused me until I saw that they no longer consider
themselves an "experimental" school, but rather a "demonstration" school. I
assume that's what "demon" means! :-)

Since it's temp. there's only a little info, but it's still interesting
reading. Three years ago the legislature almost closed them down! But the
school won the battle...

Brenda Rose
